title: Green solution to riparian pollution: Populus alba L. potential for phytoremediation and bioindication of PTEs along the Sava river
content:
Publication date: 15 April 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 7

Author(s): Zorana Miletić, Milica Jonjev, Snežana Jarić, Olga Kostić, Dimitrije Sekulić, Miroslava Mitrović, Pavle Pavlović
